name: Name
thanks: Thank You For Using Our Website
dishes_alert: All the kitchen dishes that appear to users are displayed here. Make sure that all the information is correct for ease of understanding and dealing, and that the image is appropriate for the added dish. Always make sure to change the status of the dish, whether it is currently present in the application or not, by clicking on the 'Available' button and the 'Unavailable' button.
delete_category_message: If a food item is deleted, all foods under that item may be deleted. Are you sure?
categories_alert: These items appear to the user as the type of food, and the foods in the menu are divided based on these items added here. Make sure that they are correct and brief, and that each item contains at least one dish.
category_add_alert: When adding a new item, make sure it is free of spelling errors, does not exceed ten characters, and is clear and understandable to the user.
404_alert: The page you're looking for is not found.
404_explane: Make sure the address is correct and that the page hasn't moved , If you think this is a mistake
edit_food_explane: Guidelines for Adding Food to the System: To ensure that the food items you add to the system are displayed clearly and attractively, please follow these guidelines: Accurate Information: Provide the correct name and description of each dish. This information will be displayed to customers, so ensure it accurately represents the food and highlights its key ingredients or special features. Category Selection: Choose the appropriate category for each food item. This helps customers easily find dishes and makes the menu more organized. Pricing: Enter the correct price for the dish. If a discount applies, ensure the discount value is between 1% and 100%. Any values outside of this range will not be accepted by the system. Discount: Discounts should be applied carefully. Make sure the discount reflects any promotions or offers accurately. Only values between 1% and 100% are allowed. Photo Guidelines: Photo Quality: Upload a clear, high-quality image of the dish that represents it well. File Format: The image should be in JPG or PNG format. Dimensions: The photo should be square to fit the display requirements.
login_message: Thanks to the smoothness of the app, you can now focus only on the progress of your own restaurant , while leaving the user interface design to us
delete_dish_message: If you delete the dish , you can not reback the dish information.
